roleset.name: check for errors
roleset.note: PROOFREAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'proofread' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from proofread.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: On the way to that goal, she-1 received her first U.S. paycheck for [*-1] proofreading a book of Polish poetry, attended secretarial school, then went to work for a fund-raising organization.
